Posts.Content: Keep your chin up... wish I could say more.  I'm on 5/6 TAC chemo and up until now I have felt almost normal.  After number 5: I am feeling numb,headachy, sick and basically kicked in the teeth. The anti-sick drugs worked for me this week although I promised myself at one point to never use them....(thank you nurse for making me take them home).  I f you are feeling really poorly though phone up the hospital and ask their advice.
Posts.Title: Weakness
